title: Adaptive Learning Module Design for Understanding Materials Science Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts (states of matter, atomic structure, etc.)
context.additional_context: Materials science foundational training program for new corporate employees, emphasizing social sector job relevance

learning_goals: Learners will explain the fundamental principles of decision-making structures and connect them to real-life examples.
Learners will analyze the property-structure relationship of materials using graphs/diagrams.
Learners can achieve over 80% progress and comprehension in personalized learning through adaptive systems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
